channel.title: PLAYER VS NPC Following!
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help with the "Player VS NPC". I don't care that NPC's can walk through walls, I just want to make it so when I click "Attack" monster. I want my player to walk around objects, and walls.
I am working on a new dungeoneering, and this will be really useful for keeping players inside the walls, instead of out side the walls.
I have another server that this works on, but I can't find where the code source is. If you have an Idea of where, please let me know. So I can share it, and be resourceful.
At the moment I'm looking at, PlayerAssisstant.java, and NPCHandler.java.
- Thanks!

item.title: PLAYER VS NPC Following!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Hello, I need some help with the “Player VS NPC”. I don’t care that NPC’s can walk through walls, I just want to make it so when I click “Attack” monster. I want my player to walk around objects, and walls.

I am working on a new dungeoneering, and this will be really useful for keeping players inside the walls, instead of out side the walls.

I have another server that this works on, but I can’t find where the code source is. If you have an Idea of where, please let me know. So I can share it, and be resourceful.

At the moment I’m looking at, PlayerAssisstant.java, and NPCHandler.java.

  • Thanks!
